item.title: Yvette add a quote by Gustave Flaubert
item.description: "Be steady and well-ordered in your life so that you can be fierce and original in your work." -- Gustave Flaubert

item.title: Yvette add a quote by Gustave Flaubert
item.description: "Do not imagine you can exorcise what oppresses you in life by giving vent to it in art. " -- Gustave Flaubert

item.title: Yvette add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Yvette add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Yvette add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Yvette add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Yvette add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Yvette add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "That it will never come again is what makes life so sweet." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Yvette add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda
